channel.title: New loginbox issue
channel.description:
Tutorial followed = [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/403814-custom-login-screen.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/403814-custom-login-screen.html[/url].
[IMG]http://horizonx.info/Files/blackbox.png[/img]
Okay. Following the tutorial linked above, I have successfully added everything to my client and cache links, however the new login box does not show up...just that one small black box.
If anyone could please point me in the right direction, it'd be much appreciated!

item.title: New loginbox issue
